contents.text:
Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                        A. Santoni
Request for Comments: 5955                                Actalis S.p.A.
Updates: 5544                                                August 2010
Category: Informational
ISSN: 2070-1721

contents.zh-CHS: 应用程序/时间戳数据媒体类型

contents.text: This document defines a new media type for TimeStampedData envelopes as described in RFC 5544.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义了RFC 5544中所述的TimestamedData信封的新媒体类型。

contents.text: This document is not an Internet Standards Track specification; it is published for informational purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件不是互联网标准跟踪规范；它是为了提供信息而发布的。

contents.text: This document is a product of the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF). It represents the consensus of the IETF community. It has received public review and has been approved for publication by the Internet Engineering Steering Group (IESG). Not all documents approved by the IESG are a candidate for any level of Internet Standard; see Section 2 of RFC 5741.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件是互联网工程任务组（IETF）的产品。它代表了IETF社区的共识。它已经接受了公众审查，并已被互联网工程指导小组（IESG）批准出版。并非IESG批准的所有文件都适用于任何级别的互联网标准；见RFC 5741第2节。

contents.text: Information about the current status of this document, any errata, and how to provide feedback on it may be obtained at http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc5955.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关本文件当前状态、任何勘误表以及如何提供反馈的信息，请访问http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc5955.

contents.text: Copyright (c) 2010 IETF Trust and the persons identified as the document authors. All rights reserved.
contents.zh-CHS: 版权所有（c）2010 IETF信托基金和确定为文件作者的人员。版权所有。

contents.text: This document is subject to BCP 78 and the IETF Trust's Legal Provisions Relating to IETF Documents (http://trustee.ietf.org/license-info) in effect on the date of publication of this document. Please review these documents carefully, as they describe your rights and restrictions with respect to this document. Code Components extracted from this document must include Simplified BSD License text as described in Section 4.e of the Trust Legal Provisions and are provided without warranty as described in the Simplified BSD License.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件受BCP 78和IETF信托有关IETF文件的法律规定的约束(http://trustee.ietf.org/license-info)自本文件出版之日起生效。请仔细阅读这些文件，因为它们描述了您对本文件的权利和限制。从本文件中提取的代码组件必须包括信托法律条款第4.e节中所述的简化BSD许可证文本，并提供简化BSD许可证中所述的无担保。

contents.text: This document defines a new media type for TimeStampedData envelopes. A TimeStampedData envelope, described in [RFC5544], binds a file with one or more time-stamp tokens obtained for that file. A media type registration, lacking in [RFC5544], enhances shareability.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档为TimestamedData信封定义了一种新的媒体类型。[RFC5544]中描述的TimeStampedData信封将文件与为该文件获得的一个或多个时间戳标记绑定。[RFC5544]中缺少的媒体类型注册增强了可共享性。
子类型名称：时间戳数据

contents.text: See the Security Considerations in the published specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 请参阅已发布规范中的安全注意事项。

contents.text: Applications which use this media type:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用此媒体类型的应用程序：

contents.text: Any application that exchanges TimeStampedData envelopes over a MIME-based transport and possibly processes them, either directly or via external handlers or viewers. Such applications may be, for instance, digital signature applications, archival systems, email clients, web browsers, etc.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过基于MIME的传输交换TimestamedData信封并可能直接或通过外部处理程序或查看器对其进行处理的任何应用程序。例如，此类应用程序可以是数字签名应用程序、档案系统、电子邮件客户端、web浏览器等。

contents.text: Person & email address to contact for further information:
contents.zh-CHS: 联系人和电子邮件地址，以获取更多信息：

contents.text: The security considerations of [RFC5544] apply; no new security considerations are introduced by this document.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC5544]的安全考虑适用；本文档没有引入新的安全注意事项。

contents.text: Section 2 of this document registers one media subtype.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件第2节登记了一种媒体子类型。

contents.text: [RFC5544] Santoni, A., "Syntax for Binding Documents with Time-Stamps", RFC 5544, February 2010.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC5544]Santoni，A.“带时间戳的文件绑定语法”，RFC 5544，2010年2月。

contents.text: Adriano Santoni Actalis S.p.A. Via dell'Aprica 18 20158 Milano Italy
contents.zh-CHS: Adriano Santoni Actalis S.p.A.Via dell'Aprica 18 20158意大利米兰
